xxl.core.math.functions
Class AdaptiveWeightFunctions.GeometricWeights

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.math.functions.AdaptiveWeightFunctions.GeometricWeights
All Implemented Interfaces:
RealFunction
Enclosing class:
AdaptiveWeightFunctions
public static class AdaptiveWeightFunctions.GeometricWeights
extends java.lang.Object
implements RealFunction

This class provides a geometric weighting, i.e., in each step the same weight alpha respectively (1-alpha) is assigned.
